Honeycomb Ice Cream

Rich and creamy vanilla ice cream with crunchy honeycomb toffee pieces.

Our honeycomb ice cream is made with fresh cream and pure honey from local apiaries. Each pint is packed with crunchy honeycomb toffee pieces that melt in your mouth.

Weight 14 oz
Servings 4
Category: Pints, Classics
